signature.instructions: Given the `english` text, rewrite it into `easy_english` that simplifies complex vocabulary and sentence structures while retaining the original meaning and tone. You are a professional translator specializing in literary works. Given the `easy_english` text, provide an accurate and nuanced translation into `swedish`, maintaining the original tone and style.
